topic.title: Making an AI
topic.body: Anyone can contribute to creating this AI assistant that when finished will be available for anyone to use.

1511946019_18q3WsqR7iwgwRTzsZcqDGf7zmVxC.body: No, I'm not here. I'm everywhere.

1_1CTSRUgBcYGvfN2Y1ttfcsMCZV5Y8DjVhb.body: Dialog Flow is the website that will be used. Please post an email that you can access to be invited as a dev to the project.
